Dimensional Merchant:
If you collect a piece of Costume Dark Assassin, I'll give You the Stone Processing Suit Dark Assassin.
Parts Of The Costume Are Dark Assassin
A part of the Suit Dark Assassin - bib
A part of the Suit Dark Assassin - gaiters
A part of the Suit Dark Assassin gloves
A part of the Suit Dark Assassin - footwear
The costume consists of 4 parts. Make sure You have collected them all.
